name: Run No Gun
description:
Hello Guys!

My name is Jagdish, and I am an Indie Game Developer. 

This was my first attempt to upload my first complete game.

This game is Family Friendly. 

Controls: A  +  D OR <-  +  -> space for dash move!  Only become possible because of Blackthornprod I personally really like their teaching skills and a very big Thanks to Noa and Liam. Both are really good instructor. Thank You! Blackthornprod

Feel Free to comment / Feedback it will be really appreciated.

BTW

A Small Donation will be a boost for my confidence.

Thanks for playing my game?  Enjoy!!!
